show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

header.title: Frontiers of Psychosocial Theory with Dr. Peter Kinderman

title: Frontiers of Psychosocial Theory with Dr. Peter Kinderman
content:
My guest Dr. <!--more--> Peter Kinderman heads a large Institute of Psychology, Health and Society in Great Britain, and gives us a window on the advances being made in GB compared to the US in mental health services.
  He also provides wisdom and insight into the frontiers of psychosocial theory and practice, including the origins of emotional disturbance.
A very thoughtful and educational hour.
